member.name: M:ThinkGeo.MapSuite.Layers.NoaaRadarRasterLayer.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: This is the constructor for NoaaRadarRasterLayer.
member.param: Applications accessing resources on NOAA need to provide a User-Agent header in any HTTP request. Requests without a user agent are automatically blocked. ThinkGeo provides a default UserAgent but it is strongly recommended to provide your own (by using the overload constructor NoaaWeatherStationFeatureLayer(string userAgent)), with the suggested format like this: ApplicationName/vX.Y (http://your.app.url/; contact.email@example.com).
